name: Wild Mushroom Broth With Buckwheat Noodles
recipeYield: 2 main course servings or 4 first course servings
recipeCategory: dinner, pastas, project, soups and stews
keywords: fall, main course, morels, mushroom, pasta
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound morel mushrooms, cut into 1-inch bands

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the vegetable oil in a large saute pan. Saute the morels over high heat until golden, about 3 to 5 minutes. Set aside.
Pour the mushroom broth into a saucepan and simmer over medium heat until reduced by half, about 30 minutes.
Add the soy sauce and the noodles, stir well and simmer until tender, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in morels. Ladle into four bowls and garnish with scallions.
